text: Is MTK able to model implicit systems and pass them to OrdinaryDiffEq right now? So an equation of the form `x*y - y*x + y +y^2 ~ 0` where `x` is really the differential of `y(t)`w.r.t. `t` ? I assumed that it would be possible, using the acausal model downstream, but I don't get how right now :sweat_smile:
